item.title: An Early Christmas! Beosystem 6000 is in the House!
item.description:
Today, I took a 340-mile round trip to purchase a nearly perfect Beosystem 6000 from a fellow vintage audio enthusiast. It was a fantastic day! The Beogram 6000, complete with an MMC6000 cartridge, is in fantastic cosmetic shape. All the keypads look almost brand new, the veneer is in excellent condition, and it even includes replacement plexiglass components. It even came with all of the original owner’s manuals and service manuals, including the Beomaster 6000’s German “Technische Produktbeschreibung” (product description)!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/an-early-christmas-beosystem-6000-is-in-the-house-/
